http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Module of the Transmodel Ontology focused on facilities. This ontology provides support to the NeTEx model. Visit https://github.com/oeg-upm/transmodel-ontology

https://w3id.org/transmodel/facilities#d.@value: Module of the Transmodel Ontology focused on facilities. This ontology provides support to the NetEx model. Visit https://github.com/oeg-upm/transmodel-ontology

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Specialisation of VehicleAccessEquipment dedicated to VehicleAccessAreaDimmension
Assistance Services for dissabled users of the Public Transport Network
Specialisation of LocalService for Assistance providing information like language, accessibility trained staff, etc.
Specialisation of LocalService for CateringService
Specialisation of LocalService dedicated to communication services
Component of a Site or a Place

Specialisation of PlaceAccessEquipment for CrossingEquipment

- Zebra
Generic specialisation of LocalService for CustomerServices (LostProperties, MeetingPoint, Complaiants, etc.)
Specialisation of PlaceAccessEquipment dedicated to PlaceAccessEntrance

Physical equipments installed either fixed (PlaceEquipment), on-board (VehicleEquipment) ot mixed (some equipments as rubish, sanitary or ticketing).

A service (LocalService) is considered as immaterial Equipment as well.
An EquipmentPlace is a SiteComponent containing Equipment

A named amenity available to the public at a Site or on a Service.

A Facility has no further properties than a name.

An Equipment or LocalService is used to describe the further properties provided as part of a particular Facility

A Facility of PlaceEquipment used for parking and maintaining
	vehicles. Parking Point in a Garage are called GaragePoint.
Information Booklet is public transport piece of Equipment dedicated to inform
A public transport information piece of Equipment
A public transport information piece of Equipment
A public transport information piece of Equipment in the street

Specialisation of VehicleAccessEquipment dedicated to LowFloor
Specialisation of LuggageLockerEquipment for StopPlaceEquipment

Specialisation of CustomerServices for LuggageServices.

Provides facilities as LuggageTrolley, FreeToUse, etc.
Specialisation of CustomerService for meeting points (provides characteristics like description, labels...)
The Person who uses Public Transport Services
An item of Equipment of a particular type actually available at a location within a Place or a Vehicle
A public transport information piece of Equipment, as for instance terminals (on street, at information desks, telematic,...) or printed material (leaflets displayed at Stops, booklets, ...)
A public transport information piece of Equipment which is printed material (leaflets displayed at Stops, booklets, ...)
A public transport information piece of equipment such as street stands, information desks or telematic services
Specialisation of PlaceEquipment dedicated to access (e.g. lifts, entrances, stairs, ramps, etc.)

Specialisation of PlaceAccessStair Equipment dedicated to PlaceAccessStairStair
Specialisation of PlaceAccessStair Equipment dedicated to PlaceAccessStairStaircase
An item of Equipment of a particular type actually available at a location within a Place

Specialisation of VehicleAccessEquipment dedicated to VehicleRamp
Specialisation of PlaceEquipment dedicated to access
Specialisation of LocalService dedicated to retail services
Specialisation of Passenger Equipment for Rubish Disposal
Specialisation of Passenger Equipment for Sanitary Equipment

A Service (LocalService such as LeftLuggage, TicketingService) is considered as immaterial Equipment as well.

A named Service relating to the use of the Site or transport Services at a particular location, for example Porterage, AssistanceForDissabledUsers, BookingOffices, etc. The Service may have a validityCondition associated with it.
A building or other structure constructed at a Bus Stop
Specialisation of SanitaryEquipment for showers
Specialisation of PlaceEquipment for Signs
A well known Place to which Passengers may refer to indicate the origin or a destination of a Trip
An element of a Site descibing a part of its structure. SiteComponent share common properties for data management, accessibility and other features
Specialisation of PlaceEquipment for Site
Specialisation of PlaceAccessEquipment dedicated to PlaceAccessStair

A public transport information piece of Equipment by telematic means

A classification of Cycle Storage Equipment: racks, bars, railings, etc.
A typology of emergency services: police, first aid, sos point...
A PublicTransportVehicle used for carrying Passenger
Specialisation of VehicleEquipment dedicated to access Vehicles providing information such as low floor, ramp, access area dimensions, etc.
Specialisation of PlaceEquipment for Vehicle charging
Equipment for Vehicles
A classification of Public Transport Vehicles of the same Vehicle Type, e.g. according to Equipment specifications or model generation.

A Waiting Room
Specialisation of WaitingEquipment for WaitingRoom, classified by TypeOfWaitingRoom
description for MeetingPointServices
The name of the facility
A classification of public transport Vehicles according to the facilities available on the Vehicle
Set of Facilities available for a ServiceJourney or a JourneyPart. The set may be available only for a specific VehicleType within the service (e.g. carriage equipped with low floor)
Characteristic of a Service that is free to use it
labels for MeetingPointServices
